name: HuntDroid
description:
Chase and kill the fugitive androids through the streets of a futuristic city.

HuntDroid is an old-school runner game, remake of the C64 version of "Blade Runner". The game doesn't feature ultra-modern, sophisticated graphics or 3D special effects, or amazing sounds and musics, but it is just a ready-to-go experience and my first attempt to produce a complete game with Godot Engine.  At its core it's a get-your-best-score game, with 16 colors pixel graphics and some retro SID music.

Have fun! :)

WARNING: The game contains flashy graphics
